sect2.title: Description
sect2.para: The requires element denotes a dependency between two packages. The package containing the requires element depends on the package whose name is contained in the name sub-element.
The actual name is put into a name child-element.

note.para: To work properly, the package identified in the name child-element must be defined in either the same profile as the requires element, or in an additional profile (if the ALFS implementation you are using supports loading multiple profiles).

sect2.para: The version element can be used to specify the allowable version(s) of the required package.
